title: VANDANA SINGH vs PRASHANT KUMAR
doc: IN THE SUPREME COURT OF INDIA CIVIL ORIGINAL JURISDICTION Transfer Petition(s)(Civil) No.2092/2019 VANDANA SINGH Petitioner VERSUS PRASHANT KUMAR Respondent O R D E R The parties signed the final deed of settlement dated 24th February, 2021. An amendment agreement dated 28th September, 2021 to the said final deed of settlement is placed on record by the Supreme Court Mediation Centre. In view of the settlement, the Transfer Petition is disposed of. .................................J. [ABHAY S. OKA] NEW DELHI; DECEMBER 03, 2021
bench: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE ABHAY S. OKA
author: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE ABHAY S. OKA
